name: Rexona Roll On Deodorant, Powder Dry
description: Powder dry underarm odour protection roll on envelopes you in a cocoon of soft powdery fragrance, with delicate floral notes. It provides light, yet complete coverage and has superior sweat and odour protection that lasts upto 48 hours. With 0 percent alcohol it is completely safe on skin and is dermatologist tested.*Images for illustration purpose only. Products received may vary.
